T

test() - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.Feature
Executes the feature.
Every exception and error is bundled and thrown in a FeatureException or FeatureError respectively.
Should both, an exception and an error, occur, a FeatureException is thrown.
test() - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.scenario.AbstractScenario
Executes the scenario.
test() - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.scenario.Scenario
Executes the scenario.
Every exception and error is re-thrown as ScenarioException and ScenarioError respectively.
test() - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.scenario.ScenarioOutline
Executes the scenario outline.
Exceptions and errors get caught and the scenario is executed with the rest of the test data.
test() - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.AbstractStep
Executes the step.
It first verifies if the step can and should be run.
test() - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.AbstractSteps
Executes all Steps.
If an exception or error occurs in any step, the steps which weren't executed yet, are set to be skipped and the throwable is re-thrown.
Should both, an exception and an error, occur, a StepException is thrown.
test(T) - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.TypeStep
Sets the test data to the parameter and then calls AbstractStep.test().
then(Steps) - Static method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.api.BddSuite
Creates a Steps instance and adds every Step of the parameter to it.
then(String, Runnable) - Static method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.api.BddSuite
Creates a new instance of Steps which contains the Step specified with the description and runnable.
then(Steps) - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.scenario.OutlineDescriptor
Adds all steps of the specified Steps to the OutlineDescriptor.steps.
then(TypeSteps<T>) - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.scenario.OutlineDescriptor
Adds all steps of the specified TypeSteps to the OutlineDescriptor.steps.
Note, that the generic type of the parameter has to fit the generic type of this class.
then(String, Consumer<T>) - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.scenario.OutlineDescriptor
Adds the step specified by the description and consumer to the OutlineDescriptor.steps.
The keyword of the TypeStep is Then.
then(String, Runnable) - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.scenario.OutlineDescriptor
Adds the step specified by the description and runner to the OutlineDescriptor.steps.
The keyword of the TypeStep is Then.
then(Steps) - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.AbstractSteps
Adds all steps of the specified Steps to the AbstractSteps.steps.
then(String, Runnable) - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.AbstractSteps
Adds the step with the supplied description and runner to the AbstractSteps.steps.
The keyword of the Step is Then.
then(Steps) - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.Steps
 
then(String, Runnable) - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.Steps
 
then(Steps) - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.TypeSteps
 
then(TypeSteps<T>) - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.TypeSteps
Adds all steps of the specified TypeSteps to the steps.
Note, that the generic type of the parameter has to fit the generic type of this class.
then(String, Consumer<T>) - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.TypeSteps
Adds the step specified by the description and consumer to the AbstractSteps.steps.
The keyword of the TypeStep is Then.
then(String, Runnable) - Method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.TypeSteps
 
TypeStep<T> - Class in com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps
Describes a BDD Step with a test datum.
TypeStep(GherkinKeyword, String, Consumer<T>) - Constructor for class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.TypeStep
Creates a TypeStep with the specified keyword, description, behavior but without test data.
TypeStep(GherkinKeyword, String, Consumer<T>, T) - Constructor for class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.TypeStep
Creates a TypeStep with the specified keyword, description, behavior but without test data.
TypeSteps<T> - Class in com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps
Describes a scenario with only one data set.
Thus, it has the given, when, then, and methods.
TypeSteps() - Constructor for class com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.TypeSteps
Creates new steps with an empty list.
